// EXACTAMENTE IGUAL que en el original
export const Formatters={currency:amount=>"$".concat(Number(amount).toFixed(2)),date:dateString=>{const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toLocaleDateString('es-ES');},time:date=>{return new Date(date).toLocaleTimeString('es-ES',{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'});}};
